summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4300 for the improvement of Fauntleroy Avenue, from West Alaska Street to California Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51036, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
